CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-1-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Hand useless %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-2-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-CONFUSED=confused% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-3-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-4-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d3 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-5-TEXT: Normal damage and target cannot breathe or speak. DC 20 Heal check ends the condition.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-7-TEXT: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-8-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-11-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-12-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed% for 1 round.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-13-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-14-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates save each round%).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-15-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-NAUSEATED=nauseated% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-16-TEXT: Double damage and 2d6 damage to metal armor (ignore hardness).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-17-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted% for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-18-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% and %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-21-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d6 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. This bleed can only be cured with magic.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-23-TEXT: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-24-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STAGGERED=staggered% for 1d6 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-25-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and target's speeds are reduced by 5 feet %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-27-TEXT: Normal damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone% and %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates% stun).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-28-TEXT: Normal damage and either 1d3 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and halve speed (leg) or 1d3 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% (arm). Limb useless %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-29-TEXT: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-30-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% (DC 15 Fort negates, save each round).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-31-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and target is disarmed (1 item, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Reflex negates% drop).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-32-TEXT: Normal damage and a free attack against adjacent foes at the same bonus.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-33-TEXT: Normal damage and double nonlethal damage.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-34-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target loses bite, gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-35-TEXT: Normal damage and a free trip attempt versus target and all adjacent enemies.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-36-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-37-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d3 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and target is %STATUS-FATIGUED=fatigued%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-38-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 hours.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-39-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-40-TEXT: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-42-TEXT: Double damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-43-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-44-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-45-TEXT: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-46-TEXT: Double damage and target's shield is disarmed.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-47-TEXT: Normal damage and target takes a 20% miss chance for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-48-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-49-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target's base land speed reduced to 10 feet %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-50-TEXT: Double damage and 1d4 hours of target's memory erased.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-51-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target's land speed is halved %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-52-TEXT: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents.
